title: Best of The Herd: 10/19/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 10/19/2018
description:
Colin is not at all shocked with the struggles the Lakers had in LeBron's debut because this team was not built to succeed right away. He thinks the Cowboys are in big trouble this weekend and explains why. Plus, former pro bowl LB Shawne Merriman comes in studio to talk about Khalil Mack and why people need to start paying attention to the Chargers as a contender 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
